type.name: org.gradle.api.plugins.quality.FindBugsXmlReport
type.description: * The single file XML report for FindBugs.

method.name: isWithMessages
method.description:
* Whether or not FindBugs should generate XML augmented with human-readable messages. * You should use this format if you plan to generate a report using an XSL stylesheet. *

* If {@code true}, FindBugs will augment the XML with human-readable messages. * If {@code false}, FindBugs will not augment the XML with human-readable messages. * * @return Whether or not FindBugs should generate XML augmented with human-readable messages.

method.name: setWithMessages
method.description: * Whether or not FindBugs should generate XML augmented with human-readable messages. * * @see #isWithMessages() * @param withMessages Whether or not FindBugs should generate XML augmented with human-readable messages.

property.name: withMessages
property.description:
* Whether or not FindBugs should generate XML augmented with human-readable messages. * You should use this format if you plan to generate a report using an XSL stylesheet. *

* If {@code true}, FindBugs will augment the XML with human-readable messages. * If {@code false}, FindBugs will not augment the XML with human-readable messages. * * @return Whether or not FindBugs should generate XML augmented with human-readable messages.
